intro: Platanthera × beckneri, commonly known as the Beckner's twayblade, is a hybrid orchid native to the eastern United States. It is a herbaceous perennial with a slender, grass-like stem and small, greenish-white flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded habitats such as woodlands and wetlands. It has a rhizomatous root system and produces tiny, linear leaves. Due to its hybrid origin, it exhibits a range of morphological variations in its natural populations.
